apiKeys.discordAPIKey: Your discord API key for the app (https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/me)
apiKeys.wLogsAPIKey: Your WarCraft Logs API key from https://www.warcraftlogs.com/accounts/changeuser

guildInfo.guildRealm: Your guild's realm (without spaces and other strange characters, as can be seen in the armory)
guildInfo.guildRegion: Your guild's region code, i.e. eu
